summary: This document contains a checklist and verification results for the business account of Freedom Air Petroleum, LLC at First Bank. It includes details about the account opening procedures, required documentation, and the results of a business verification check, indicating that the entity passed the OFAC check and had no matching records found. This document contains various financial records and due diligence forms related to Freedom Air Petroleum LLC, including information about authorized signers, beneficial ownership, and the company's formation and operational agreements. It highlights the involvement of Jeffrey Epstein as the sole member and provides details about the company's registration and compliance with financial regulations.

events.title: Business Verification Check
events.description: A verification check was conducted for Freedom Air Petroleum, LLC, which passed the OFAC check with no matching records found.

events.title: Submission of SS-4 Form
events.description: The SS-4 form dated 12/19/2011 was received from the client along with the Articles of Incorporation and Operating Agreement.

events.title: Formation of Freedom Air Petroleum LLC
events.description: Freedom Air Petroleum LLC was registered to conduct business in the U.S. Virgin Islands.

events.description: The operating agreement for Freedom Air Petroleum LLC was executed, detailing the management and operational structure.

events.title: Employer Identification Number Assigned
events.description: The IRS assigned an Employer Identification Number (EIN) to Freedom Air Petroleum LLC.

keyFacts: The account for Freedom Air Petroleum, LLC was opened at First Bank.
The business verification check for Freedom Air Petroleum, LLC passed the OFAC check.
Madelin Colon was responsible for adding the verification results to the account file.
The SS-4 form and other incorporation documents were submitted by the client.
Jeffrey Epstein is the sole member of Freedom Air Petroleum LLC.
The company was formed on November 28, 2011, and registered to conduct business in the U.S. Virgin Islands.
The operating agreement for the company was signed on December 12, 2011, outlining its management structure.
The IRS assigned an Employer Identification Number (EIN) to Freedom Air Petroleum LLC on December 19, 2011.
Lawrence Visoski confirmed that the company has not conducted any business since its formation.
